translations: v．举起，掂量：用手举起或掂量某物的重量。
· He hefted the package to see how heavy it was.
他举起包裹看看有多重。

sentences.sentence: He hefted the heavy camera up onto his shoulder.
sentences.translation: 他把重重的相机扛到了自己的肩上。

sentences.sentence: He hefted the box and said it was not too heavy.
sentences.translation: 他掂了掂那个箱子说不算太重。

sentences.sentence: He hefted a sack of wheat to see how heavy it was.
sentences.translation: 他举起一袋麦子看看有多重。
